visPheno.usage:
1. Select data
  2. PARSE
  3. Select plotting options
  4. PLOT

PUBLIC DATA tab allow to use online resources and needs inertnet connection
OWN DATA tab allows to choose data on you device
PROJECT DATA tab allows you access data on the backend

GWAS.usage:
1. Select data from PUBLIC DATA tab
  2. PARSE
  3. PLOT PUBLIC DATA
OR
  1. Select data from OWN DATA tab
  2. RUN GWAS TOOL

PUBLIC DATA tab allow to visualize GWAS results from public resources and needs inertnet connection
OWN DATA tab allows to perform GWAS analyis using data on you device in plink format
PROJECT DATA tab allows you to perform GWAS on the data stored on backend Minio Object Storage

PCA.description: this is the pca usage documentation
